title: LEGO.Batman.3.Beyond.Gotham.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
LEGO.Batman.3.Beyond.Gotham.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  


Release year : 2014
Genre : Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : TT Games Ltd
Publisher : WB Games
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Eng
Crack: 3DM





System requirements:  


Operating system : Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent AMD dual core CPU
RAM : 2 GB
Video Card : 256 MB (NVIDIA GeForce 7600GS or ATI Radeon 1950)
Sound Card : Sound device
Free space on hard disk : 11.5 GB


Game information:  



Breakout game series LEGO Batman returns, and that means you will a new amazing
adventure! The game Ã‚Â«LEGO Batman 3: Leaving Gotham" The Dark Knight will team up
with other heroes DC universe and go into space to stop Brainiac to destroy the
Earth. Using the ring of power, the wily villain reduces whole cities and replenishes
them his sinister collection. Only the greatest superheroes and supervillains
under the mightiest force to stop him ... but for this they need to come together
and visit the many worlds in search of new rings of power. Should hurry - time is
left a bit!


Game Features:  

For the first time Batman and his colleagues to fight in space, as well as in
different worlds lamp housing.

At your disposal will be over 150 unique characters that have incredible powers
and abilities. Among them are members of the Justice League, and the characters
are giant Cyborg, Solomon Grundy and others.

Thanks to all possible masking ability Brainiac subjugate others and extraordinary
possibilities rings forces you will find many unexpected plot twists and surprises
even the most well-known heroes.

Penetrates into the virtual worlds and break codes, explore mazes, fight in the
arena and participate in races.

Choose and enhance the ability of the costumes and characters by pressing one button.

Visit the legendary places - Hall of Justice, the cave of Batman, Justice League watchtower
and get access to shops, trophies and possible changes in the characters and technology.



RePack Features:  

LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham
Includes Update 1
Do not recoded
